name: Brake Pad Replacement
description: A service to replace worn brake pads with new ones to ensure safe braking performance.
steps: Raise the vehicle and remove the wheel.
Remove the old brake pads and inspect the brake caliper.
Apply caliper grease to the new brake pads.
Install the new brake pads and reassemble the brake caliper.
Refill brake fluid if necessary and test the brakes.

name: Oil Change
description: A service to replace old engine oil with new oil to ensure smooth engine performance.
steps: Raise the vehicle and locate the oil drain plug.
Remove the drain plug and drain the old oil.
Replace the oil filter.
Reinstall the drain plug and add new engine oil.
Check the oil level and test the engine.

name: Tire Rotation
description: A service to rotate the tires to ensure even tire wear and extend tire life.
steps: Raise the vehicle and remove the wheels.
Rotate the tires according to the recommended pattern.
Reinstall the wheels and lower the vehicle.
Torque the lug nuts to the manufacturer's specifications.
Check tire pressure and adjust if necessary.

name: Battery Replacement
description: A service to replace a dead or weak car battery with a new one.
steps: Turn off the vehicle and disconnect the negative battery terminal.
Disconnect the positive battery terminal and remove the old battery.
Clean the battery terminals and install the new battery.
Reconnect the positive and negative battery terminals.
Start the vehicle and check the battery voltage.

name: Air Filter Replacement
description: A service to replace a dirty or clogged air filter with a new one to ensure proper engine air flow.
steps: Locate the air filter housing and remove the cover.
Remove the old air filter and clean the housing.
Install the new air filter and replace the cover.
Ensure the cover is securely fastened.
Start the engine and check for proper air flow.

name: Spark Plug Replacement
description: A service to replace old or worn spark plugs with new ones to ensure proper engine ignition.
steps: Locate the spark plugs and remove the ignition coils.
Remove the old spark plugs using a spark plug wrench.
Apply dielectric grease to the new spark plugs.
Install the new spark plugs and reattach the ignition coils.
Start the engine and check for proper ignition.

name: Coolant Flush
description: A service to flush out old coolant and replace it with new coolant to ensure proper engine cooling.
steps: Locate the radiator drain plug and drain the old coolant.
Flush the cooling system with a coolant flush kit.
Refill the cooling system with new coolant.
Bleed the cooling system to remove air pockets.
Check the coolant level and test the engine.

name: Transmission Fluid Change
description: A service to replace old transmission fluid with new fluid to ensure smooth transmission operation.
steps: Raise the vehicle and locate the transmission drain plug.
Remove the drain plug and drain the old transmission fluid.
Replace the transmission filter.
Reinstall the drain plug and add new transmission fluid.
Check the transmission fluid level and test the transmission.

name: Brake Fluid Flush
description: A service to flush out old brake fluid and replace it with new fluid to ensure proper braking performance.
steps: Locate the brake fluid reservoir and remove the old brake fluid.
Flush the brake lines with a brake bleeder kit.
Refill the brake fluid reservoir with new brake fluid.
Bleed the brake lines to remove air pockets.
Check the brake fluid level and test the brakes.

name: Power Steering Fluid Change
description: A service to replace old power steering fluid with new fluid to ensure smooth steering operation.
steps: Locate the power steering fluid reservoir and remove the old fluid.
Flush the power steering system with new fluid.
Refill the power steering fluid reservoir with new fluid.
Bleed the power steering system to remove air pockets.
Check the power steering fluid level and test the steering.

name: Fuel Filter Replacement
description: A service to replace a clogged fuel filter with a new one to ensure proper fuel flow.
steps: Locate the fuel filter and relieve the fuel system pressure.
Remove the old fuel filter and install the new one.
Reconnect the fuel lines and check for leaks.
Start the engine and check for proper fuel flow.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper operation.

name: Cabin Air Filter Replacement
description: A service to replace a dirty or clogged cabin air filter with a new one to ensure clean air inside the vehicle.
steps: Locate the cabin air filter housing and remove the cover.
Remove the old cabin air filter and clean the housing.
Install the new cabin air filter and replace the cover.
Ensure the cover is securely fastened.
Test the air conditioning system for proper air flow.

name: Serpentine Belt Replacement
description: A service to replace a worn or damaged serpentine belt with a new one to ensure proper engine operation.
steps: Locate the serpentine belt and release the tension.
Remove the old serpentine belt and install the new one.
Reapply tension to the serpentine belt.
Check the belt alignment and adjust if necessary.
Start the engine and check for proper belt operation.

name: Headlight Bulb Replacement
description: A service to replace a burnt-out headlight bulb with a new one to ensure proper visibility.
steps: Locate the headlight bulb and remove the cover.
Disconnect the old headlight bulb and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and replace the cover.
Ensure the cover is securely fastened.
Test the headlight for proper operation.

name: Windshield Wiper Replacement
description: A service to replace old or worn windshield wipers with new ones to ensure clear visibility.
steps: Lift the windshield wiper arm and remove the old wiper blade.
Install the new wiper blade and lower the wiper arm.
Ensure the wiper blade is securely attached.
Test the windshield wipers for proper operation.
Check the windshield washer fluid level and refill if necessary.

name: Radiator Replacement
description: A service to replace a damaged or leaking radiator with a new one to ensure proper engine cooling.
steps: Drain the old coolant from the radiator.
Remove the old radiator and install the new one.
Reconnect the radiator hoses and fill with new coolant.
Bleed the cooling system to remove air pockets.
Check for leaks and test the engine.

name: Alternator Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty alternator with a new one to ensure proper charging of the battery.
steps: Disconnect the battery and remove the old alternator.
Install the new alternator and reconnect the wiring.
Reapply tension to the serpentine belt.
Reconnect the battery and start the engine.
Check the charging system for proper operation.

name: Timing Belt Replacement
description: A service to replace a worn or damaged timing belt with a new one to ensure proper engine timing.
steps: Remove the old timing belt and install the new one.
Reapply tension to the timing belt.
Check the timing marks and adjust if necessary.
Reassemble the engine components.
Start the engine and check for proper timing.

name: Water Pump Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty water pump with a new one to ensure proper engine cooling.
steps: Drain the old coolant from the radiator.
Remove the old water pump and install the new one.
Reconnect the water pump and fill with new coolant.
Bleed the cooling system to remove air pockets.
Check for leaks and test the engine.

name: Exhaust System Replacement
description: A service to replace a damaged or leaking exhaust system with a new one to ensure proper exhaust flow.
steps: Remove the old exhaust system and install the new one.
Reconnect the exhaust system and secure with clamps.
Check for leaks and adjust if necessary.
Start the engine and check for proper exhaust flow.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper operation.

name: Suspension System Replacement
description: A service to replace worn or damaged suspension components with new ones to ensure proper ride and handling.
steps: Raise the vehicle and remove the old suspension components.
Install the new suspension components and secure with bolts.
Lower the vehicle and check the suspension alignment.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper ride and handling.
Adjust the suspension alignment if necessary.

name: Clutch Replacement
description: A service to replace a worn or damaged clutch with a new one to ensure proper transmission operation.
steps: Remove the old clutch and install the new one.
Reconnect the transmission and secure with bolts.
Check the clutch alignment and adjust if necessary.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper transmission operation.
Adjust the clutch alignment if necessary.

name: Differential Fluid Change
description: A service to replace old differential fluid with new fluid to ensure proper differential operation.
steps: Raise the vehicle and locate the differential drain plug.
Remove the drain plug and drain the old differential fluid.
Reinstall the drain plug and add new differential fluid.
Check the differential fluid level and adjust if necessary.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper differential operation.

name: Drive Belt Replacement
description: A service to replace a worn or damaged drive belt with a new one to ensure proper engine operation.
steps: Locate the drive belt and release the tension.
Remove the old drive belt and install the new one.
Reapply tension to the drive belt.
Check the belt alignment and adjust if necessary.
Start the engine and check for proper belt operation.

name: Fuel Injector Cleaning
description: A service to clean the fuel injectors to ensure proper fuel flow and engine performance.
steps: Add fuel injector cleaner to the fuel tank.
Run the engine to circulate the cleaner through the fuel system.
Remove the fuel injectors and clean them with fuel system cleaner.
Reinstall the fuel injectors and check for leaks.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper engine performance.

name: Throttle Body Cleaning
description: A service to clean the throttle body to ensure proper air flow and engine performance.
steps: Remove the air intake hose and locate the throttle body.
Spray throttle body cleaner into the throttle body.
Use a rag to clean the throttle body.
Reinstall the air intake hose and check for leaks.
Start the engine and check for proper air flow.

name: PCV Valve Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty PCV valve with a new one to ensure proper engine ventilation.
steps: Locate the PCV valve and remove the old one.
Install the new PCV valve.
Reconnect any hoses or components.
Start the engine and check for proper operation.

name: Oxygen Sensor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty oxygen sensor with a new one to ensure proper engine performance and fuel efficiency.
steps: Locate the faulty oxygen sensor and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old oxygen sensor using a wrench.
Install the new oxygen sensor and reconnect the wiring.
Start the engine and check for proper operation.

name: Radiator Hose Replacement
description: A service to replace worn or damaged radiator hoses with new ones to ensure proper engine cooling.
steps: Drain the coolant from the radiator.
Remove the old radiator hoses and install the new ones.
Secure the hoses with new hose clamps.
Refill the radiator with coolant.
Start the engine and check for leaks.

name: Thermostat Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty thermostat with a new one to ensure proper engine temperature regulation.
steps: Drain the coolant from the radiator.
Remove the old thermostat and gasket.
Install the new thermostat and gasket.
Refill the radiator with coolant.
Start the engine and check for proper temperature regulation.

name: Wheel Bearing Replacement
description: A service to replace worn or damaged wheel bearings with new ones to ensure smooth wheel rotation.
steps: Raise the vehicle and remove the wheel.
Remove the old wheel bearings and clean the hub.
Install the new wheel bearings and apply grease.
Reassemble the wheel and lower the vehicle.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper operation.

name: Shock Absorber Replacement
description: A service to replace worn or damaged shock absorbers with new ones to ensure proper ride comfort and handling.
steps: Raise the vehicle and remove the old shock absorbers.
Install the new shock absorbers and secure with bolts.
Lower the vehicle and check the suspension alignment.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper ride comfort and handling.

name: Fuel Pump Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty fuel pump with a new one to ensure proper fuel delivery to the engine.
steps: Relieve the fuel system pressure.
Remove the old fuel pump and install the new one.
Reconnect the fuel lines and check for leaks.
Start the engine and check for proper fuel delivery.
Test drive the vehicle to ensure proper operation.

name: AC Compressor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty AC compressor with a new one to ensure proper air conditioning operation.
steps: Recover the refrigerant from the AC system.
Remove the old AC compressor and install the new one.
Recharge the AC system with refrigerant.
Start the engine and check for proper AC operation.
Test the air conditioning system for proper cooling.

name: Heater Core Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty heater core with a new one to ensure proper heating inside the vehicle.
steps: Drain the coolant from the radiator.
Remove the old heater core and install the new one.
Reconnect the heater hoses and fill with coolant.
Bleed the cooling system to remove air pockets.
Check for leaks and test the heating system.

name: Window Regulator Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty window regulator with a new one to ensure proper window operation.
steps: Remove the door panel and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old window regulator and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and replace the door panel.
Test the window for proper operation.

name: Door Lock Actuator Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty door lock actuator with a new one to ensure proper door locking and unlocking.
steps: Remove the door panel and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old door lock actuator and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and replace the door panel.
Test the door lock for proper operation.

name: Ignition Coil Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty ignition coil with a new one to ensure proper engine ignition.
steps: Locate the faulty ignition coil and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old ignition coil and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper engine ignition.

name: Mass Air Flow Sensor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty mass air flow sensor with a new one to ensure proper air-fuel mixture.
steps: Locate the mass air flow sensor and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old mass air flow sensor and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper air-fuel mixture.

name: Throttle Position Sensor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty throttle position sensor with a new one to ensure proper throttle response.
steps: Locate the throttle position sensor and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old throttle position sensor and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper throttle response.

name: EGR Valve Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty EGR valve with a new one to ensure proper exhaust gas recirculation.
steps: Locate the EGR valve and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old EGR valve and gasket.
Install the new EGR valve and gasket.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper exhaust gas recirculation.

name: Catalytic Converter Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty catalytic converter with a new one to ensure proper exhaust emission control.
steps: Raise the vehicle and locate the catalytic converter.
Remove the old catalytic converter and gaskets.
Install the new catalytic converter and gaskets.
Lower the vehicle and start the engine.
Check for proper exhaust emission control.

name: Fuel Pressure Regulator Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty fuel pressure regulator with a new one to ensure proper fuel pressure.
steps: Locate the fuel pressure regulator and disconnect the fuel lines.
Remove the old fuel pressure regulator and install the new one.
Reconnect the fuel lines and check for leaks.
Start the engine and check for proper fuel pressure.

name: Idle Air Control Valve Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty idle air control valve with a new one to ensure proper engine idle.
steps: Locate the idle air control valve and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old idle air control valve and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper engine idle.

name: Crankshaft Position Sensor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty crankshaft position sensor with a new one to ensure proper engine timing.
steps: Locate the crankshaft position sensor and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old crankshaft position sensor and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper engine timing.

name: Camshaft Position Sensor Replacement
description: A service to replace a faulty camshaft position sensor with a new one to ensure proper engine timing.
steps: Locate the camshaft position sensor and disconnect the wiring.
Remove the old camshaft position sensor and install the new one.
Reconnect the wiring and start the engine.
Check for proper engine timing.
